data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: A diesel train belts its way through the Highlands. The sun is starting to set and people on board feel sleepy after what seems like a never-ending journey. As the carriages attempt hard to pump their way to the top of the next peak, a strong stench of petrol seeps through the carriages. Smoke starts to billow through the train as a fire has caught hold.
data.original_output: A diesel train belts its way through the Highlands. The sun is starting to set and people on board feel sleepy after what seems like a never-ending journey. As the carriages attempt hard to pump their way to the top of the next peak, a strong stench of petrol seeps through the carriages. Smoke starts to bellow through the train as a fire has caught hold.

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: I stamp my feet in outrage and send my brother for help. My mother appears with a weary look on her face. It is not the first time that my name has been misspelled. I stare at the antagonising letter.
data.original_output: I stamp my feet in outrage and send my brother for help. My mother appears with a weary look on her face. It is not the first time that my name has been misspelled. I stare at the antagonising letter .

data.boring_theme: having an organ empire and complying with regulations
data.output: Daisy wondered what it would be like to receive someone else's organ. She wondered if she would gain any special powers from the other person. "Imagine if the donor had ruled an empire!" She exclaimed. "Will I be more powerful?!" But Daisy also knew that to receive the organ she would need to comply with the doctors.
data.original_output: Daisy wondered what it would be like to receive someone else's organ. She wondered if she would gain any special powers from the other person. "Imagine if the donor had ruled an empire!" she exclaimed. "Will I be more powerful?!" But Daisy also knew that to receive the organ she would need to comply with the doctors.

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.output: Rose shouldn't be forced to exist in this gloom. The UK weather was so depressing. "Get me on a plane to hotter climes immediately!" She demanded. Waving her credit card around she screamed "Come on people! Allow me to make that payment".
